DATA HANDELING and DATA CLEANING

To upload the data (csv) and store it in a variable

```{data = read.csv("Salary.csv")}
```

knowing about the data

```{undefined echo=TRUE}
dim(data)
```

```{r}
summary(data)

```

```{r}
head(data) #by default inital 6 rows
head(data, 8) #set the no. of rows to be displayed from the top
```

changing the column names

```{r}
colnames(data)[1] = "NAME"
colnames(data)[2:5]= c("JOB","AGENCYid","AGENCYNAME","HIREINGdate")

colnames(data)

```
